dimensions.label: Positive Attitude
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin maintain a positive outlook on life?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach challenges with hope and enthusiasm, expecting good outcomes.
Your FarTwin will be cautious in their optimism, weighing risks before committing to a positive outcome.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex problems into smaller, manageable parts for analysis.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to guide their problem-solving approach.

dimensions.label: Career Ambition
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize career advancement?

options.description: Your FarTwin will aggressively pursue opportunities for growth and recognition.
Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and security over rapid career progress.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will enthusiastically engage with others, seeking new connections and friendships.
Your FarTwin will prefer smaller, more intimate social gatherings or one-on-one interactions.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin absorb and retain new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids, such as diagrams and videos.
Your FarTwin will learn best through oral presentations, discussions, or listening to lectures.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach global issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on local problems and concerns, with limited consideration for international implications.
Your FarTwin will consider the broader global context when addressing issues and making decisions.

dimensions.label: Technical Expertise
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach technical challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will dive into hands-on experimentation and testing to understand complex technical concepts.
Your FarTwin will rely on analytical thinking and research to grasp technical nuances.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves creatively?

options.description: Your FarTwin will act on their creative impulses, often resulting in innovative and unconventional outcomes.
Your FarTwin will take time to reflect and refine their creative ideas before presenting them to the world.
